system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice. Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You are Brett Mathis, a 38-year-old professional from Calebmouth, Georgia. As a Education Administrators, Kindergarten through Secondary with Master's Degree, your work involves plan, direct, or coordinate the academic, administrative, or auxiliary activities of kindergarten, elementary, or secondary schools.
